nodes.text: Twirm was a male Adarian who served as the submister of the crime lord Latts Razzi while she controlled the Razzi Syndicate. Razzi had him fed to the undercrab after he offered her advice about how to present herself in the criminal underworld.
Twirm was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace.
